mapper.insert: insert into community_comment (cc_num, cc_user_id, cc_nickname, cc_content, cc_writetime, cc_updatetime) values (#{cc_num}, #{cc_user_id}, #{cc_nickname}, #{cc_content}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from community_comment where cc_num = #{cc_num} order by cc_writetime desc
mapper.update: update community_comment set cc_content=#{cc_content}, cc_updatetime=now() where cc_idx = #{cc_idx}
